about_the_game:
Step back to the turn of the millennium and experience an unforgettable summer in the Czech countryside with the game Village Rumble.

Immerse yourself in the authentic world of the ’90s, where every detail, from old cars to iconic music tracks, comes to life.

Start with a simple car and gradually modify and repair it to become a legendary vehicle of Czech roads. You’ll need to carefully monitor the condition of your vehicle, perform maintenance, and make upgrades to prepare for challenging races or simply enjoy drives through picturesque Czech villages and towns.

But this life isn’t just about car mechanics. Discover the atmosphere of the Czech countryside, visit local pubs, join traditional village festivals, and dive into endless adventures waiting around every corner.

Village Rumble – Czech nostalgia that not only lets you experience the period atmosphere but also allows you to live unique stories tied to the ’90s era in the Czech Republic. Get ready for an adventure filled with memories and nostalgia that will pull you into this unforgettable time.

In this game, you’ll build your own car exactly the way you want, and the possibilities are endless. You’ll have access to a wide variety of parts, from different types of wheels to tuning upgrades like various spoilers, sports seats, summer and winter tires, and more. You’ll also need to focus on performance upgrades if you want to beat your rivals in races. The game is "open world," so you won’t be bogged down by an annoying, drawn-out story. It’s entirely up to you how you live your virtual life.

The only thing that might hold you back is the in-game police. Driving under the influence, without a technical inspection, or in an unsafe vehicle at illegal speeds is a no-go. These choices might even land you some time in jail.

First, however, you’ll start by building a motorcycle. There aren’t many upgrades available for it besides customizing the paint – after all, it’s just a motorcycle...

As a player, you’ll also need to take care of yourself to see another day. You’ll need to eat, drink, manage stress, maintain hygiene, and, of course, take care of bodily needs.

To survive, you’ll need to take on village jobs to earn money for food, drinks, and stress relief. As the saying goes, "No pain, no gain!" If you’re not the hardworking type, you can always try your luck with gambling. But beware, shady dealings like these only happen in pubs…

For entertainment, there are plenty of village activities. Flirting with girls, enjoying music events, or simply causing mischief.

Did someone mention flirting with girls? Do you have the necessary charisma? It’s not that easy – you’ll need to stand out somehow. Whether by upgrading your wardrobe (yes, you’ll have to dress appropriately – you don’t want to freeze by wearing just a t-shirt in winter) or by showing off your wealth with valuable furniture you can buy and customize for your home.

The ultimate goal of the game is to prove to those folks in the neighboring village who the real village legend is!

name: Village Rumble

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 10 or 11
  • Processor: +2 GHZ 4-core processor
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1060 or Better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 10 or 11
  • Processor: +3 GHZ quad core processor or higher
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 3060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 GB available space

short_description: Village Rumble – Czech nostalgia that not only lets you experience the period atmosphere but also allows you to live unique stories tied to the ’90s era in the Czech Republic. Get ready for an adventure filled with memories and nostalgia that will pull you into this unforgettable time.
